summary: User timeline_26 chronicles struggles with OCD and anxiety, showing gradual improvement with therapy.

posts.text: Thinking about stopping my meds. I'm a burden to everyone I'm losing my mind Called my psychiatrist first. used my DBT skills We're trying a different medication instead. I'm not giving up
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I'll never get better. I'm a burden to everyone All this therapy for nothing. I can't get out of bed anymore My therapist reminded me how far I've come. tried a new coping mechanism Looking at my progress journal from six months ago. I'm committed to my recovery
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The constant worry is exhausting. Everyone would be better off without me I can't focus on anything. I isolated myself from all my friends My therapist recommended meditation so I used my DBT skills and I'm building a support system
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me
I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Haven't left my apartment in days. Nothing will ever get better I can't get out of bed anymore Forced myself to go for a walk today called the crisis hotline and called my sister. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I push everyone away when I'm depressed. I'm a burden to everyone I'm completely numb Trying to communicate better with my partner. did some self-care activities I apologized and explained what I'm going through. Small steps are still progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Had a really bad day after weeks of progress. I'm a burden to everyone I've been having suicidal thoughts Using my coping skills instead of old habits. did some self-care activities This setback doesn't erase my progress. I'm being patient with myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feeling hopeful for the first time in months. wrote in my journal I'm committed to my recovery Had a bad moment yesterday. Nothing will ever get better But I worked through it using my tools. I'm committed to my recovery
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: The constant worry is exhausting. I have no reason to keep going I can't focus on anything. I'm failing at everything My therapist recommended meditation so I practiced my coping strategies and Things can get better
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been isolating myself from everyone. I hate myself so much I can't see a future for myself But today I reached out to an old friend reached out for help and we made plans to meet up. I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: I can't see a future for myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been struggling with depression for weeks now. I want to give up on everything I stopped taking my medication But yesterday I finally set healthy boundaries and scheduled an appointment. I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thinking about stopping my meds. I feel completely hopeless I'm completely numb Called my psychiatrist first. talked to a friend about what I'm going through We're trying a different medication instead. I'm learning healthier coping skills
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't handle the pressure anymore. I'm a burden to everyone I'm spiraling out of control Started setting better boundaries at work. called the crisis hotline Learned to say no to extra projects. I'm building a support system
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
